review: The ad's look cool, and it does work more or less as advertised, although a little slower than advertised, but here's the real rub. Mainly it's a sales gimmick, when you access your kindle movie library you get movies and TV shows thrown in that you don't own. You cannot access your own apps and games, you cannot access your own music etc. It is a neat idea and with some work would be a really cool product but, right now it is basically a sales gimmick. The voice command feature is neat but not always helpful. I would still Recommend this product but with the hope that in the future it will be more for the customer and less for pushing items and sale.
